item.title: Beyond AI Literacy: Why Double Literacy Is The Future Of Innovation
item.description: At the heart of navigating our AI-saturated society lies a critical skillset: double literacy. Article 4 of the new EU AI Act brings this to the foref...

item.title: Yes, Kendrick Lamar’s Super Bowl Halftime Show Was On A PlayStation Controller
item.description: Was Kendrick Lamar picking random shapes or was his Super Bowl halftime show deliberately being performed on a PlayStation DualShock controller?

item.description: Here's how the Oppo Find N5, world's thinnest book-style foldable compares to the Samsung Galaxy Z Fold 6, Honor Magic V3, OnePlus Open and more.

item.title: Yes, AI Is Capable Of Improving Trust—Here’s How
item.description: Ironically, AI, often criticized for exacerbating digital deception and misinformation, holds immense potential to improve trust.

item.title: Skibidi Security Alert—’Bizarrely Dangerous’ Java Threat
item.description: As a new collaborative security research hub is launched, the strange tale of the Skibidi Java threat emerges.
